intro: Callisteris, commonly known as the desert lily, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Agavaceae. These plants are native to the arid and semi-arid regions of the southwestern United States and northern Mexico. They play an important role in desert ecosystems by providing nectar for pollinators and serving as a food source for wildlife.
